doc: Error : Could not evaluate condition on org.springframework.cloud.netflix.zuul.ZuulConfiguration#routeLocator due to com/netflix/zuul/ZuulFilter not found
Getting following error while start the spring boot admin server
2016-09-26 18:36:35.108 ERROR 11162 --- [           main] o.s.boot.SpringApplication               : Application startup failed

java.lang.IllegalStateException: Could not evaluate condition on org.springframework.cloud.netflix.zuul.ZuulConfiguration#routeLocator due to com/netflix/zuul/ZuulFilter not found. Make sure your own configuration does not rely on that class. This can also happen if you are @ComponentScanning a springframework package (e.g. if you put a @ComponentScan in the default package by mistake)
